name: sliced in sauce
versioning: With tuna in a sauce with a fine seafood note and with salmon in a sauce with a fine grilled salmon note
title: Gourmet Perle · sliced in sauce · With tuna in a sauce with a fine seafood note and with salmon in a sauce with a fine grilled salmon note
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce With tuna in a sauce with a fine seafood note and with salmon in a sauce with a fine grilled salmon note I just can't resist this gentle temptation

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat is a true gourmet, but sometimes it is difficult to find exactly her taste? For this reason GOURMET has created Perle - Pleasure of the Sea. The delicate varieties will appeal to your cat's senses in an irresistible way every day. Exquisite strips of fish were cooked in a tasty sauce to preserve the pleasure of the sea and to pamper the palate with small velvet paws. GOURMET Pearl Pleasure of the sea - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.  GOURMET Pearl Pleasure of the sea - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Contains 4 recipes: Deep-sea fish and shrimp, plaice and shrimp, salmon and shrimp, tuna and shrimp

otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey  / www.purina.ch

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4 kg) 3 bis 4 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls
